product_name: The North Face Voltage Shorts - Men's
long_description: Built with moisture-wicking fabric and mesh FlashDry(TM) ventilation panels to keep you dry and cool, The North Face Voltage Shorts are ready for the workout whenever you are. Main fabric is stretchy and breathable; stretch-mesh panels are placed to increase ventilation in high-heat areas and include moisture-wicking FlashDry fibers. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. The North Face Voltage Shorts for men feature an internal drawcord, reflective highlights and 2 hand pockets. Part of The North Face Mountain Athletic line of technical clothing and footwear built to withstand the rigors of sport-specific training by outdoor athletes.
short_description: Built with moisture-wicking fabric and mesh FlashDry(TM) ventilation panels to keep you dry and cool, The North Face Voltage Shorts are ready for the workout whenever you are.
